channel.title: Ryan Selkis on ₿itcoin Transcripts
channel.description: Recent content in Ryan Selkis on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: Opening Remarks State Of Blockchain
item.description: Preliminary notes: Contact me- https://twitter.com/kanzure Opening remarks & state of blockchain Ryan Selkis, Coindesk Garrick Hileman, The Cambridge Centre for Alternative Finance Ladies and gentlemen, the session will begin in 5 minutes. Please take your seats. The session is about to begin. Please welcome Ryan Selkis from CoinDesk. (obnoxious music plays, overly dramatic) Wow is all I can say about what’s happening over the last couple of months. This is absolutely incredible.
